name: Giant Fire Elemental
description: A massive embodiment of fire, capable of moving through narrow spaces and causing damage with its fiery aura.
memorable: Exceedingly powerful in combat with a fiery aura that damages nearby creatures.
goals: Survive and dominate in fiery or volcanic environments.
relations: Can be associated with other fire elementals or creatures found in volcanic regions.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison, along with several condition immunities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage from water sources.
attacks: Can make two slam attacks dealing significant fire damage, along with ongoing fire damage effects.
most_powerful_ability: Wildfire ability allows it to move without provoking attacks and damage foes within its proximity.
additional_information: Fire Form enables movement through narrow spaces.
Fiery Aura deals damage to nearby creatures.
Elemental Nature allows it to not require air, food, or sleep.
Can trigger ongoing fire damage to those who strike it.
Excels at mobility, making it hard to pin down.
test_queries: fiery creature that moves through narrow spaces
mobile fire elemental with damaging aura
elemental that suffers from water damage
